```{r}
#Merging datasets
Edu_Employ = rbind(Edu_Employ_09, Edu_Employ_17)

```{r}
#Creating years list
years = 
  HEE_merged %>%
  distinct(year) %>%
  pull()

#Creating input for years
numericInput(
  "year_choice",
  label = h4("Select year (2009-2017)"),
  min = 2009,
  max = 2017,
  value = 2017,
  step = 8
  )
```

### Homelessness and Education and Employment in US by State

```{r}
##Creating interactive map

renderPlotly({
	geo1 = list(
	  scope = "usa",
	  projection = list(type = "albers usa"),
	  lakecolor = toRGB("white")
	)


HEE_merged %>% 
  mutate(state_name = openintro::abbr2state(state)) %>% 
	filter(year == input[["year_choice"]]) %>% 
  plot_geo(locationmode = "USA-states") %>% 
	add_trace(
		z = ~total_homeless, ~total_employ, ~total_edu,
		locations = ~state,
		text = ~paste(total_employ, total_edu, state_name, sep = "\n"),
		color = ~total_homeless,
		colors = "Greens"
		) %>%
    colorbar(title = input[["variable_type"]]) %>%
	layout(
		geo = geo1,
		title = "Homelessness, Education, and Employment in the United States")
})
```
